Token.Abstract: Protocol for advanced sync up target where records are not simply created/updated/deleted With advanced sync up target, sync manager simply calls the method: syncUpRecord
Sync up locally created/updated or deleted record back to server

Parameter.Name: syncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The sync manager doing the sync

Parameter.Name: fieldlist
Parameter.Abstract: List of fields to send to server

Parameter.Name: mergeMode
Parameter.Abstract: Merge mode (overwrite or leave if changed)

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The block to execute after the server call completes.

Parameter.Name: failBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The block to execute if the server call fails.
